data.comment: Michael Salisbury starts the match. Barnsley with the kick-off in Stoke.
Goal! Elliot Simoes gives Barnsley a 0-1 lead in Stoke.
In the minute 44, Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Tyrese Campbell.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Barnsley take a 1-2 lead thanks to Dominik Frieser.
In the minute 46, Stoke kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Goal! Tommy Smith levels the match at 2-2.
Barnsley make their first substitution with Herbie Kane replacing Romal Palmer.
In the minute 60, At bet365 Stadium, Nathan Collins is shown a red card and sent off.
The home team replace Steven Fletcher with Jacob Brown.
Tashan Oakley-Boothe is replacing Nick Powell for the home team.
In the minute 77, Michael O'Neill (Stoke) is making a third substitution, with Tom Ince replacing Tyrese Campbell.
The away team have replaced Elliot Simoes with Luke Thomas. This is the second substitution made today by Adam Murray.
Patrick Schmidt is replacing Callum Brittain for Barnsley at bet365 Stadium.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-2.
